mapper.select: SELECT S_NUM, STUDY_NAME, LOC, CATEGORY, IMG, RECRUITMENT,TO_CHAR(INPUT_DATE, 'yyyy/mm/dd') INPUT_DATE, NICK, USER_IMG FROM (SELECT S.S_NUM, S.STUDY_NAME, S.LOC, S.CATEGORY, S.IMG, S.RECRUITMENT, S.INPUT_DATE, U.NICK, U.IMG USER_IMG, ROW_NUMBER() OVER( ORDER BY S.INPUT_DATE DESC) R_NUM FROM STUDY S, USER_TABLE U WHERE S.ID=U.ID AND ACCEPT_FLAG='Y' AND S.DEACTIVATION='N' AND DELETE_FLAG='N' ) ORDER BY R_NUM ASC
